1. TASK: Update UI so the AI button (id="enhancePrompt") displays only a faint emoji (✨) with no border or background, looking like a subtle overlay rather than a button. Apply minimal changes to public/styles.css and, if strictly necessary for accessibility, add aria-label to the button in public/index.html. Preserve element IDs and existing JS behavior.

2. EXPECTED OUTCOME:
- public/styles.css updated: .ai-btn becomes background: transparent; border: none; no box-shadow; shows emoji centered; uses reduced opacity (e.g., 0.6) and on hover/focus increases opacity and subtle scale; accessible focus ring still present (use var(--focus-shadow)); size approx 28px; remains absolutely positioned in top-right of prompt-row as implemented earlier.
- public/index.html: only add aria-label="Enhance prompt with AI" if the button lacks one (do not change id or structure). Keep inner text replaced with the emoji ✨.
- Visual: Emoji appears faint over prompt, not a prominent button; keyboard focus still works and visible.
- Functional: Clicking emoji still triggers existing handler (no JS changes required).

3. REQUIRED SKILLS: frontend CSS, accessibility (aria), minimal HTML editing.

4. REQUIRED TOOLS: read, edit, write, bash (build). Do not add new dependencies.

5. MUST DO:
- Replace button inner text with emoji ✨ in index.html if necessary.
- Update .ai-btn CSS: transparent background, no border, no box-shadow, color/opacity tuned, hover/focus transitions, maintain absolute positioning and responsiveness for small screens.
- Ensure textarea padding-right remains sufficient so emoji doesn't obscure typed text.
- Add :focus-visible support and respect prefers-reduced-motion.
- Run npm run build after edits and report any lsp_diagnostics issues.

6. MUST NOT DO:
- Do not rename or remove enhancePrompt id.
- Do not change JS event handlers.
- Do not modify server code or add packages.

7. CONTEXT: Repo path: /home/mrmg/Development/Build/draw-things-client/nodejs-grpc-client. Files to edit: public/styles.css, public/index.html (only if necessary). Current button markup: <button id="enhancePrompt" class="ai-btn" title="Enhance prompt with AI">AI</button>

Return: apply edits, run build, then return a short summary of edits and verification output.
